body.p: In the exposure draft published in June 2006, the Board proposed to exclude from the definition of a financial liability a contractual obligation that entitles the holder to a pro rata share of the net assets of the entity only on liquidation of the entity. The liquidation of the entity may be:

li.p: certain to occur and outside the control of the entity (limited life entities); or
uncertain to occur but at the option of the holder (for example, some partnership interests).
